context: WEX operating three segments: Mobility (largest by revenue), Benefits, and Corporate Payments. Trailing twelve-month revenue of $2.6B. Facing intensifying competition from fleet tech innovators and fintech disruptors. Traditional fleet card dominance challenged by new players offering faster, more efficient digital-first solutions.
